Translations.Text: Niscaya manuhaka srsti karaa haiche atisaya dhairyahina asthiracittaraupe
Yetiya taka bipade sparsa karae tetiya si atimatraa utkanthita hai parae
Arau yetiya taka kalyane sparsa karae tetiya si atisaya krpana hai parae
Kintu chalata pratisthakaraisakalara bahirae
yisakale nija chalatara ksetrata sadaya pratisthita
arau yisakalara dhana-sampadata nirdharaita hakba ache
khojaniya-maganiya arau bancitasakalara babe
arau yisakale pratiphala dirasaka satya buli bisbasa karae
Arau yisakale nija pratipalakara sasti samparke bhita-santrasta
niscaya te'omlokara pratipalakara sastira paraa niraapada hai thaka nayaya
arau yisakale nijara yaunangasamuhara hiphajatakarai
kintu sihamtara patni athaba adhikarabhukta dasira bahirae, ene ksetrata sihamta nindaniya naha’ba
kintu yisakale e'omlokara bahirae anaka kamana karae, sihamte'i simalanghanakarai
Arau yisakale nijara amanata arau pratisrauti raksa karae
arau yisakale nija saksyadanata atala
arau yisakale nijara chalatara hiphajata karae
te'omloke'i jannatasamuhata sanmanita ha’ba
Kaphirasakalara ki ha’la, sihamte dekhuna tomara phale dhapaliya'i ahi ache
som phalara paraa arau ba'om phalara paraa, dale dale
Sihamtara pratyeke'i e'ito asa karae neki ye, taka praacuryamaya jannatata praraesa karaoraa ha’ba
ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamtaka yitorae srsti karaicho seya sihamte jane
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho udayasthala arau astacalasamuhara pratipalakara, arasye ami saksama
sihamtatakai utkrstasakalaka sihamtara sthalararti karaibalai, arau ene karaata ami aksama nahaya
Eteke sihamtaka nirarthaka katha-bataraa arau khela-dhemalita matta hai thakibalai diya-- yi dinara pratisrauti sihamtaka diya haiche se'i dinara sanmukhina nohoraa paryanta
Se'idina sihamta kabarara paraa drautabegata ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yeniba sihamte kono laksyasthalara phale dhabita haiche
sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba e'itorae se'idina yara bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila
Niscaya ami nuhaka te'omra sampradayara prati e'i nirdesasaha praerana karaichilo ye, ‘sihamtara ocarata yantranadayaka sasti ahara purbe tumi sihamtaka satarka karai diya’
Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe spasta satarkakarai
‘e'i bisaye ye, tomaloke allahara ibadata karaa arau te'omra takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau mora anugatya karaa

te'om tomalokara babe tomalokara papasamuha ksama karaiba arau tomalokaka eta nirdista samaya paryanta arakasa diba. Niscaya allahara nirdharaita samaya upasthita ha’le seya (ketiya'o) bilamba karaa nahaya; yadi tomaloke e'ito janilahemtena!’
Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Niscaya ma'i mora sampradayaka dine raatiye ahbana karaicho
‘kintu mora ahbanata sihamtara amtarai yoraatohe brd'dhi pa'iche’

Arau yetiya'i ma'i sihamtaka ahbana karaicho yate tumi sihamtaka ksama karaa, sihamte nijara kanata anulirae sopa diche arau kaporaerae nijake dhaki laiche, arau amkoragomja hai thakiche lagate ati dambhikatarae aud'dhatya prakasa karaiche
‘Tara pichato ma'i sihamtaka prakasya ahbana karaicho
‘akau sihamtaka ma'i prakasya arau ati gopaniyabharae'o ahbana karaicho’
Arau kaicho, tomalokara pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa, niscaya te'om mahaksamasila
te'om tomalokara babe pracura paraimane barasuna barsaba
‘arau tomalokaka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati pradana karai sahaya karaiba arau tomalokara babe udyana sthapana karaiba arau nada-nadi prabahita karaiba
Tomalokara ki ha'la, tomaloke allahara sraesthatba upalabdhi nakaraa kiya
‘Athaca teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche paryayakrame
Tomaloke laksya karaa na'ine, allahe kenekai starae starae satakhana akasa srsti karaiche
arau e'iborara majata candraka srsti karaiche pohara hicape arau suryaka bana'iche pradipa
‘Arau allahe tomalokaka matira paraa udbhuta karaiche
‘tara pichata te'om tomalokaka talai ubhata'i niba arau niscitabharae tomalokaka punaraut'thita karaiba
‘arau allahe prthiraikhanaka tomalokara babe bistrta karaiche
‘yate tomaloke tata prasasta pathata calacala karaiba paraa’
Nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Sihamte moka aman'ya karaiche arau ene lokara anusarana karaiche yara dhana-sampada arau santana-santatiye kerala tara ksatihe brd'dhi karaiche’
Arau sihamte bhayaraha sarayantra karaiche
arau sihamte kaiche, ‘tomaloke ketiya'o tomalokara upasyasakalaka barjana nakaraiba; arau paraityaga nakaraiba adda, churaa'a, iyagucha, iya'ukba arau nacharaka’
‘Niscaya sihamte bahulokaka pathabhrasta karaiche, arau (he allaha) tumi yalimasakalara babe bhrastatara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’
Sihamtara aparaadhara babe sihamtaka duba'i diya ha’la tara pichata sihamtaka ju'ita praraesa karaoraa ha’la, eteke sihamte allahara bahirae ana kako sahayakarai hicape poraa nachila
Arau nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Prthiraira kaphirasakalara majara paraa kono grhabasika arasista naraakhiba
‘Yadi tumi sihamtaka arasista raakha tente sihamte tomara bandasakalaka pathabhrasta karaiba arau sihamte kerala duskrtikarai kaphirakahe janma diba

He mora pratipalaka! Moka arau mora pitr-matrka arau yiye muminahai mora gharata praraesa karaiba lagate mumina purausa arau mumina naraisakalaka ksama karai diya; arau yalimasakalara babe dhbansara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’
